text: Duncan McLauchlin "Lauch" Faircloth (January 14, 1928 - September 14, 2023) was an American politician and businessman. He served one term as a Republican U.S. Senator from North Carolina from January 3, 1993 through January 3, 1999. He lost re-election in 1998 to John Edwards.CNN (November 3, 1998) Edwards unseats Faircloth in tight North Carolina race Faircloth was born in Sampson County, North Carolina. Faircloth died at his home in Clinton, North Carolina, on September 14, 2023, at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== *Oral History Interviews with Lauch Faircloth , from Oral Histories of the American South Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:United States senators from North Carolina Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Lauch Faircloth
